All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.NamingContainer, javax.faces.component.StateHolder, oracle.adf.view.rich.dnd.DragSourceFactory
public class UIAreaDataLayer
extends UIDataLayer
implements oracle.adf.view.rich.dnd.DragSourceFactory

The Area Data Layer allows developers to display data associated with geographical regions of the map using styles (such as colors or patterns), markers, or other adornments
